channel.title: NEED A Hoster (No-IP Would Be Better) (Also Ham Will Work For Now)
channel.description:

Must Be no-ip or just the i.p. number (I Might Accept Ham)
Close to my timezone 6:00
MSN
Must Be Dedicated To Running *AlchemyScape*.
Also nice, if you have a nice computer, with no lagg =)
Look at my banner =p
